name: 布雷特·马林
introduction: Brett Maline is a Los Angeles based, multi-hyphenate, award-winning actor/writer/director. From small town Nebraska, he's niche because he lives with a rare type of scoliosis and drives a PT Cruiser.Brett was just named to the 2023 Inevitable Foundation Elevate Collective Cohort where he's receiving a grant and executive mentorship to develop his original TV and film scripts. This past year he wrote on the upcoming 2nd season of Marvel's Loki while developing his half hour comedy with Sony television, supervised by Dayna Lynne North. The show is based on his award winning short film he wrote, directed, and starred in.With appearances on CBS, NBC, Amazon Prime, and Disney, Brett is a former cast member of the 2016 CBS Diversity Showcase, Groundlings Sunday Company alum, and a UCB house sketch team veteran. He continues to write, direct, and produce videos for his YouTube channel Genuine Jerks (www.youtube.com/genuinejerks) that has been featured on the Today Show, Good Morning America, and Vulture.
